response.overview: Vijaya Chander acts ina lead role as Sai Baba Devotee.Srinivas Varma and sagarika both are wife and husband love eachother.But Srinivas mother will not tolerate with sagarika as srinivas wife,she plans to murder sagarika with his brother support.They will kill sagarika and creates a story that she have stolen jewellry from home to her husband(Srinivas).He wont accept it,his mother tries to set marriage between Srinivas and Ujwala.At this time Sagarika becomes a athma and tries to kill her Mother in law and others who have killed her.But Vijayachander will enters and says that sagarika is doing mistake.Then sagarika will stops killing.
response.title: Sai Bhakti Kshudra Shakti
